query.name: findGroupByOidAndCrfId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM_GROUP WHERE OC_OID = ? and crf_id=?

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE ITEM_GROUP SET name=?,crf_id =?, status_id=?, date_updated = sysdate,update_id=?, WHERE ITEM_GROUP_ID=?

query.name: findGroupsByItemID
query.sql: select fg.* from item_group fg, item_group_metadata fgm, item it where it.item_id = ? and it.item_id=fgm.item_id and fgm.item_group_id = fg.item_group_id

query.name: findGroupByCRFVersionID
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm where igm.crf_version_id=? and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id

query.name: findGroupBySectionId
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, section s, item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = ifm.section_id and ifm.item_id = igm.item_id

query.name: findCurrentPKValue
query.sql: select item_group_id_seq.currval as key from dual

query.name: getNextPK
query.sql: select item_group_id_seq.nextval as key from dual

query.name: findOnlyGroupsByCRFVersionID
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm where igm.crf_version_id=? and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and ig.name != 'Ungrouped'

query.name: findLegitGroupBySectionId
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, section s, item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = ifm.section_id and ifm.item_id = igm.item_id and ig.name != 'Ungrouped' and igm.repeating_group = 1

query.name: isItemGroupRepeatingBasedOnAllCrfVersions
query.sql: select count(igm.item_group_metadata_id) count from item_group ig,item_group_metadata igm where ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id AND oc_oid=? and (repeat_number > 1 or repeat_max > 1)

query.name: isItemGroupRepeatingBasedOnCrfVersion
query.sql: select count(igm.item_group_metadata_id) count from item_group ig,item_group_metadata igm where ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id AND oc_oid=? and crf_version_id = ? and (repeat_number > 1 or repeat_max > 1)

query.name: findTopOneGroupBySectionId
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, section s, item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = ifm.section_id and ifm.item_id = igm.item_id and ig.name != 'Ungrouped' and igm.repeating_group = 1 and rownum = 1
